post:
**HostOrbits** offers Dedicated servers in affordable price. We have highest priority on customer's data and we implemented major security appliances on premise. We have data-centers on major US cities ie Los Angeles, Miami and NewYork Metrocity. In our Express server package, your server get provisioned within hours of time. Our technicians are available to resolve issues within minutes of when they occur.


_Customers can Choose **EXPRESS DEDICATED SERVERS** when you need a pre-configured bare metal server setup in minutes. Express server configurations offer a pre-packaged bundle available for instant setup with your operating system of choice. Custom dedicated servers are available for customers that need a solution to meet specific requirements. Custom dedicated servers can be customized to include additional memory, hard drives, and bandwidth. Click on a server to view details and additional available options. Contact us with any questions regarding our dedicated servers or available addons._
